Interrupts.Name: Shadow Slip
Interrupts.Description: When targeted by an attack, gain evasion against that attack, then after the attack resolves, teleport to the space of a shadow clone and replace it, removing the clone and gaining stealth. This interrupt can be repeated as long as there is at least one shadow clone.

Actions.Name: Shadow Clone
Actions.Description: Summon a shadow clone in a free space in range 3, an intangible size 1 summon. Foes adjacent to a shadow clone at the start of their turn take fray damage from the clone. Clones disappear at the end of combat or if the assassin in defeated.
